title: What Makes 'Lupin' a Good Hang
description:
Justin Charity and Micah Peters talk about what makes 'Lupin,' the current no. 1 show on Netflix, such a fun and stylish heist show.

For the full conversation on 'Lupin,' check out 'Sound Only.'

Hosts: Justin Charity and Micah Peters
